DOC.brief_summary: During control ovarian hyperstimulation ( COH ) , human chorionic gonadotrophin ( hCG ) administer trigger final follicular maturation oocyte retrieval , attempt mimic physiologic effect LH . The hCG administer three follicle ≥17mm mean diameter develop . The time interval hCG administration oocyte retrieval critical importance since time luteinizing stimulus period intense process include start luteinization , expansion cumulus cell oocyte meiotic maturation . The commonly practice hCG administration time 33 36 h IVF cycle aim avoid spontaneous ovulation oocyte retrieval . However , several study show significantly high quality embryo obtain prolonged hCG-to-oocyte interval 38 h. It hypothesize long interval would beneficial improve oocyte quality achieve optimal maturation . Currently data effect time interval hCG administration oocyte retrieval IVF outcome GnRH antagonist cycle . The aim study determine whether difference vitro fertilization outcome oocyte retrieval take place 36 h 38 h follow hCG administration
DOC.brief_title: Is IVF Outcome Dependent Time Interval Between hCG Administration Oocyte Retrieval ?
DOC.criteria: woman undergo fresh IVF cycle recombinant FSH GnRH antagonists regular spontaneous menstrual cycle ( 2435 day ) age ≤ 43 year FSH ≤ 20 IU/L History previous ovarian surgery Women Stage IIIIV Endometriosis Women undergo natural cycle IVF
DOC.keyword: IVF , hCG , oocyte retrieval , time interval
